MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Function IsAudioOnly (videoState As VideoProfileState) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the video state is audio only.
Docs.returns: True if the video state is audio only, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Indicates whether the video state is audio only.
Note: Considers only whether either both the #STATE_RX_ENABLED or #STATE_TX_ENABLED bits are off, but not #STATE_PAUSED.
